description:
Subscribe for more! https://www.youtube.com/austinevans
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@austintechtips
Instagram: https://instagram.com/austinnotduncan

Threads: https://www.threads.net/@austinnotduncan

I decided to put GameStop's new retro game initiative to the test by buying a bunch of old consoles and games. What I got was a wild ride of broken discs, dirty consoles, and even some mystery items that weren't what I ordered at all. Despite some bright spots, GameStop's Retro left a lot to be desired.

Chapter Titles:
0:00 Buying from GameStop Retro
1:56 Nintendo DSi XL
3:25 Nintendo Wii U
6:25 DSi XL Part 2
8:05 Wii U Part 2
9:43 PlayStation 2
12:58 OG Xbox
16:37 Things Go Wrong Here
20:10 PlayStation Vita
20:57 PlayStation 3
23:11 PS Vita Part 2
title: Is GameStop Retro a SCAM?
